title: 7 ways to be yourself in a relationship
text: Have you ever been so in love that you lost yourself in the relationship? Have you had his likes and dislikes overshadow yours? Have you always done it his way without thinking about things that you would like to do? If your answer to any of these is yes, then first thing you need to know is that it is okay. It’s okay if this has been you so far. A lot of women are passive and compliant to the desires of their partners and often forget who they are in a relationship. But it is never too late to start being yourself.
description: Women often drown themselves in relationships. This leads to them being unhappy and resentful. Here are 7 ways that one can be themselves in a relationship.
